name: Day of the Week
RandomQuote()
RandomQuote()
func:
msg.topic = [
  // Classics & Originals
  "Rise and shine!",
  "It's time to get up and seize the day!",
  "The early bird gets the worm.",
  "It's a beautiful day outside.",
  "The sun is shining, the birds are singing, and it's time to wake up!",
  "Wakey wakey, eggs and bakey!",
  "It's time to rise and grind.",
  "Time to get out of bed and start your day.",
  "The day is calling, so don't be late.",
  "Wake up, sleepyhead!",
  "It's time to face the world.",
  "The alarm clock has spoken.",
  "It's time to get moving.",
  "Don't miss out on all the fun today!",
  "The day is here, so make the most of it.",
  "Wake up and smell the coffee.",
  "The day is yours, so go out and conquer it!",
  "Rise and shine, buttercup!",
  "The day is waiting for you.",
  "Wake up and make it a great day!",
  "The world is your oyster.",

  // Gentle & Sweet
  "Good morning, sunshine.",
  "The morning is here, and it's happy to see you.",
  "Time to wake up, my little star.",
  "A brand new day is here to give you a hug.",
  "Wake up, sleepyhead. The world missed you.",
  "Good morning, my favorite person to wake up.",
  "The sun has peeked over the horizon just to say hello to you.",

  // Fun & Silly
  "Beep boop! This is your robot butler, requesting you to wake up.",
  "The pillow has declared the sleeping competition is over. You won!",
  "Time to activate daytime mode!",
  "Wakey wakey, sleepy snakey!",
  "Come on, sleepyhead, the toast is getting nervous.",
  "Time to unleash the breakfast monster!",
  "The floor is lava... but first, you have to get out of bed!",
  "I hear pancakes calling your name...",
  "The wiggle-out-of-bed challenge starts now!",

  // Adventurous & Exciting
  "Good morning, adventurer! A new quest awaits.",
  "Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to have an amazing day.",
  "Captain, the ship of 'Today' is ready to set sail!",
  "Time to assemble, little hero! The day needs saving.",
  "Greetings, Earthling! It's time to explore Planet Day.",
  "Let the great adventure of today begin!",
  "Your daily mission briefing is ready. Let's go!",

  // Motivational & Empowering
  "Time to wake up and be awesome!",
  "Let's see what amazing things you'll do today.",
  "A new day means new ideas and new fun. Let's go!",
  "Ready to fill this day with your sparkle?",
  "It's a new day to be your amazing self.",
  "Let's make some happy happen today.",
  "Wake up your body, wake up your mind, it's a great day you'll find!"
];

function getRandomItem(wakeUpQuotes) {
  // Generate a random number between 0 and the length of the array
    var randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * wakeUpQuotes.length);

  // Return the item at the random index
    msg.payload = wakeUpQuotes[randomIndex];
    return msg;
}

getRandomItem(msg.topic);

return msg;

name: RandPlaylist()
Test From Day of Week Gate

Allergen Extraction
function 33
Greater Than Message
func:
msg.payload = "HELOC APR increased by " + (msg.payload[1].state - msg.payload[0].state).toFixed(3) + "%";
return msg;

name: Less Than Message
func:
msg.payload = "HELOC APR decreased by " + (msg.payload[0].state - msg.payload[1].state).toFixed(3) + "%";
return msg;

name: Equal Message
func:
msg.payload = "HELOC APR is " + msg.payload[1].state + "%";
return msg;

name: Notify Flavia
data: {"message":"Take your Iron and your Vitamin D.","title":"Take your pills"}

name: Notify Dad
data: {"message":"{{payload.attributes.friendly_name}} has a battery level of {{payload.state}}%","title":"Low Battery Alert"}
